name: Sweet Valley Junior High | 10 Question Literature Multiple Choice Quiz

questions.text: Who does the 17th book in the series feature?
questions.explanation:
Lacey.

	The 17th book is 'Whatever'. It's when Lacey's mom, Sonia, comes to visit. But Kristin isn't so sure because Sonia always blows everything up. Kristin wants her friend to be happy and not hurt by Sonia.

questions.text: How old are Elizabeth and Jessica?
questions.explanation:
13.

	They are 13 in the eighth grade. They were rezoned to Sweet Valley Junior High.

questions.text: Who is not a character in the Sweet Valley Junior High series?
questions.explanation:
Bruce.

	Todd appears in 'The Cool Crowd'. Billy is Brian's older brother. Leaf is Blue's older brother. Blue's parents are both dead.

John.

	Lacey tells Sonia this in 'Whatever' and Jessica hears Lacey say John in 'Get Real'. Gel is Lacey's boyfriend.

questions.text: Who wrote the "Sweet Valley Junior High" series?
questions.explanation:
Jamie Suzzane.

	Molly wrote "Sweet Valley Kids". Francine is the creator of the "Sweet Valley" franchise. Kate wrote "Sweet Valley High". Jamie wrote "Sweet Valley Twins and Friends" also.

Griggs.

	He is a player who dated Elizabeth. Then, he went for Lacey. He dated Liz in 'Hands Off', the 15th book.

questions.text: Who is Elizabeth's steady in Sweet Valley Junior High?
questions.explanation:
Blue.

	Brian is Kristin's boyfriend and Todd is her steady in Sweet Valley High. Blue is a cute surfer who is in a band called Big Noise.

Margie.

	She was a model. This is how she tells Kristin about Sonia. They were waiting in a record place waiting for Sonia to come, but she never showed up. She had gone somewhere else!

Rosa.

	You find this out in 'Hands Off'. Elizabeth is talking about Richard's aunt, Barbara Griggs who wrote for the 'LA Times'. No one knew who she was and Salvador said, "My aunt is Rosa del Valle."

questions.text: Who is the principal of Sweet Valley Junior High?
questions.explanation:
Mr. Todd

	Mr. Todd is the principal. Mr. Clark was the principal for Sweet Valley Middle School.
